sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Crypto market remains under sustained bearish pressure as weak demand and low confidence dominate price action into year-end.
A hoped-for breakout year in 2025 failed to materialize as the October crypto crash dragged down the already struggling corner of the alts...
Bears have a firm grip on the leading GameFi tokens, with the majority of them in the red.
Bitcoin bulls are putting up a fight on Friday to break this week's choppy action that has capped all advances at around $90000.
BitFuFu Inc. is deeply undervalued versus peers, trading at a forward EV/Sales of 1.23x. Click here to read why FUFU stock is a Buy.

hypothesis_content.title: BTC 4-Hour Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a period of low volatility (Bollinger Band Width < 0.02) on the 4-hour chart during a NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the upper band with volume > 150% of 20-period average will lead to a directional move of at least 3% in the breakout direction within the next 12 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Compression periods during neutral regimes often precede significant directional moves as pent-up energy releases. Volume confirmation filters out false breakouts. The 4-hour timeframe captures institutional and algorithmic trading cycles.
entry_conditions: BTC 4H Bollinger Band Width (20,2) < 0.02 for at least 4 consecutive candles
Candle closes above upper Bollinger Band
Volume on breakout candle > 150% of 20-period volume average

exit_conditions.take_profit: 3% price move from entry in breakout direction
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Close back inside Bollinger Bands (below upper band for long)
exit_conditions.time_exit: 12 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout occurs with volume confirmation but price fails to sustain momentum, returning inside bands within 3 candles more than 40% of the time.
